mapper.select: SELECT MB.MNAME, MB.MEMAIL, MB.MPHONE, PP.PASSPORTNO, OL.OPLNUM, OL.OID, to_char(OL.odeptdate,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi') as odeptdate, OL.OSTATUS, OL.ODEPT, OL. OELPHONE FROM ORDERLIST OL JOIN MEMBER MB ON OL.MID = MB.MID JOIN PASSPORT PP ON MB.MID = PP.MID WHERE OL.OID = #{OID} AND OL.OSTATUS in ('on_delivery','pay_complete')

SELECT NVL ( count, 0 ) as count, b.hours as hours FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS count , to_number(TO_CHAR ( a.odeptdate, 'HH24' )) AS hours FROM orderlist a WHERE a.odeptdate BETWEEN to_date(to_char(current_date,'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') AND to_date(to_char(current_date,'YYYYMMDD')) + 0.99999 AND a.ostatus in ('on_delivery') GROUP BY TO_CHAR ( a.odeptdate, 'HH24' ) ) a right join ( SELECT to_number(TO_CHAR ( LEVEL ))-1 as hours FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 24 ) b on a.hours = b.hours order by 2
